activities.title: PF Study Session
activities.description: This time slot will be reserved to every student who wants to study and receive tutoring.

activities.title: [Workshop] ShowOff Elixir
activities.description: Join us for an exciting workshop where we dive into the world of Elixir, a dynamic, functional language designed for building scalable and maintainable applications. Perfect for both beginners and experienced programmers looking to expand their skill set.

activities.title: Board Games
activities.description: Take a break from coding and join us for an evening of board games. Whether you're a strategic mastermind or just looking to have some fun, this event is perfect for unwinding and socializing with fellow students.
